**Example 1: 创建NodeUnit**



Input: 

```
tccli iecp CreateUpdateNodeUnit --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --EdgeUnitId 1 \
    --Namespace default \
    --NodeGroupName test \
    --NodeUnitName testunit
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "cb461dbc-de1a-4618-9536-f1d3d18a2e1e"
    }
}
```
